Player History
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1966, hitting .360 with 3 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1966 Allstar game...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (N) on 2/13/1967 (Going to CHC: SS W. Garrett. Going to NYM: LF B. Williams)...
Was selected to the 1967 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 9/27/1967...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1969...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 4/11/1972, off Charlie Hough (PIT)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1972, hitting .347 with 6 HR, 20 RBI...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Won MVP Award in 1972, hitting .322 with 23 HR, 100 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/3/1973, hitting .483 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/16/1973, hitting .583 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1975, hitting .706 with 5 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1975, hitting .480 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Had 3000th career hit on 6/29/1977, off Andy Messersmith (CHC)...
